1100100100100011 1001010100001000 1 -> sum: 0101111000101100, cout: 1

1101111010101011 0011101111001110 0 -> sum: 0001101001111001, cout: 1
0010000011110011 0111001100101110 0 -> sum: 1001010000100001, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
